page.title: 07Industry In Wragby
page.content: { THORNES' BEEHIVE WORKS. { { }Thornes' of Wragby is along Louth Road.{It is the biggest company {of its kind in the country.}There they make all kinds of things connected with bees-honey,candles,books and clothing and equipment for beekeepers. {45 people work at Thornes' and more {people are taken on when it gets busy. The firm has been in Wragby for 68 years. The wood to make the hives comes mainly from{Canada,}but some timber comes from{Russia.}The wax arrives in big blocks.Thornes' sell bees as well.At the moment they have 50 beehives full,but there should be 300.Thornes' have 2 delivery vans.They {send queen bees to Europe}and their {other products are sold all over the {world.
